Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers have a chance to clinch the NL Central with a win over the Phillies
The Phillies evened the series after winning the previous game 5-1
The Brewers' magic number dropped to one with the Chicago Cubs' loss to the Oakland Athletics
The Phillies lowered their magic number to clinch the NL East to four, and to one to secure a postseason berth
The top two teams in the NL get a first-round bye in the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies improved to 34-1 this season when a starting pitcher goes at least seven innings, including 34 straight
Others: Bryce Harper and Nick Castellanos each homered in the previous game
Zack Wheeler allowed one run over seven dominant innings in the previous game
Freddy Peralta picked up the win in his last outing, allowing one run in five innings in a 2-1 victory at Arizona last Friday
Aaron Nola has won just once over his past 11 starts
Aaron Nola has given up five homers in 15 innings in his three starts this month
